import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link, BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch, withRouter, HashRouter, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' class ExplClient extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { nomClient: '', adresse: '', numeroTelephone: '', email: '' } } componentDidMount() { let id_client = this.props.location.state.id_client; axios.get(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL + 'Back_snaii/GetClientById.php?id=' + id_client).then(res => { console.log(res) this.setState({ nomClient: res.data.nomClient, adresse: res.data.adresse, numeroTelephone: res.data.numeroTelephone, email: res.data.email }) }) } render() { return (
